title: Introducing Short Wave
description: Short Wave, NPR's new daily science podcast, starts October 15th. Join host Maddie Sofia for new discoveries, everyday mysteries, and the science behind the headlines – all in about 10 minutes, Monday through Friday. Subscribe now.
copyright: Copyright 2019-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
